Reviews.Title: terrific camera that's easy to use
Reviews.Author: Matthew G. Sherwin
Reviews.Content: When they say "this one's got it all," they mean it! This is certainly an upgrade to what I had before; and there's more features to this that I imaged there ever could be. It's built to last quite some while and it doesn't stint on options. Fortunately, however, I was able to learn how to use it rather quickly; and even the manual is well written! Most manuals are no fun to read but this one is written quite well in plain English and that's terrific. It also comes with a CD-ROM that lets you install the necessary computer software to connect the computer to the camera; the software also lets you register the camera with Sony and copy an extra instruction manual onto your hard drive. Moreover, this camera takes clear images every time and of course that built in flash works wonders. The buttons and dials are easy to manipulate and press; although you do have to be careful to press them using the edge of your finger (or your fingernail) because a few of the buttons are small.The camera comes on "auto" for those of us who don't want to fiddle too much before taking pictures--but of course there's so much more to this camera than just the "auto" mode. Use the mode dial to access modes for taking pictures on the beach so that the blueness of the water looks as blue as can be, taking pictures when it's snowy to make the snow look a bit extra white, take a picture when the camera detects that someone is smiling, and much more! The control button and one or two other buttons help you to get the flash working under more than one setting, view and delete pictures and again, much more. You can easily attach this camera to your computer so that you can upload photos to your hard drive for storage there--or for posting your pictures to a website which can be incredibly useful and fun. In addition, to preserve the life of the battery pack between charges the camera shuts itself off after roughly three minutes of non-usage; this is a very good feature. I'm impressed.The camera is capable of taking video clips although I don't think that it is designed primarily for that purpose. However, it will let you record video; the camera has a built in speaker, microphone and a "movie mode" to do this well.In addition, you'll need to charge the battery pack for about four and one-half hours prior to shooting any pictures so don't wait until the moment you need this to open it up and use it. The memory stick will be ready to go, fortunately. I purchased an eight gigabyte memory stick so that I'll have plenty of space for storing my photos and movies. Be sure to get the memory stick and not the memory card; a memory card may not fit in the slot. At roughly twelve megapixels an eight gigabyte memory stick will hold about sixteen hundred photos.There is also an internal rechargeable battery that may need to be charged if you don't use the camera for over a month. In case this occurs, make sure your battery pack is fully charged and then insert it so that the battery pack charges the internal battery for twenty-four hours or a little bit longer--while the camera is turned off. That should solve the problem. Sony also has ways for you to contact them in case you have further questions about the camera and how to keep this working for a long time to come!Overall, I really like this camera; and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Sleek, Lightweight Camera!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Erwin
Reviews.Content: This camera is so small and lightweight, it will fit into a pocket in a pair of jeans, or even a pocket that is on the front of a T-Shirt.  When we received this camera I was so impressed at how light the item was and the magnificant pictures it takes.  It powers on very quickly to help to not miss that special picture that you might miss with other cameras because they take so long to power on.  The camera is sleek, portable, and takes awesome pictures.  It has many of features that we have not yet been able to try out.  I think if you are looking for a small, sleek, camera to take to a baseball game, or something of that nature to keep from having to drag a big huge SLR camera or bigger digital camera, this camera will do the job perfectly! I highly recommend this camera to anyone that is looking for a lightweight, nice picture taking camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jose. A
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife and she loves it!! She is real picky when it comes to cameras. It has every feature she was looking for. Small, great pictures, long battery life and its pink. I also purchased a 4gb MS duo card for her that gives her lots of picture taking opportunities.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Rosi C
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony Cybershot 3.5 camera that got lots of use.  Lately it seemed like I was getting more fuzzy shots than clear ones.  Time to upgrade the camera.  This was a great price, and Sony is a great brand.  It hasn't disappointed me.  I'm now able to get all of those action pictures of the kids in clear detail.  And the screen is much larger than my other Sony.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Grace in Kansas
Reviews.Content: Neither my husband nor I have much experience with cameras, but took this one on our European vacation and had such fun taking pictures.  It's very easy to use, requires no focusing, and was easy to tote around.  I would highly recommend this camera to novice photographers.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good point & shoot
Reviews.Author: S. Higgins
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty nice camera for casual snaps and travel photos.  I like the portability, the image stabilization, and the lens is pretty sharp; I like the fairly good wide angle coverage.  The cons are few, but are important to me.  First off, the flash is just about worthless.  It is either off or ****FLASH****.  You can turn it down in the menus, but it is still overpowering when you use it.  Perhaps my camera is defective.  Secondly, the battery life could be better. It isn't horrible, but you pay for the petite battery size with fewer shots.  Try to avoid reviewing all your photos while you're out shooting, the backlight in the LCD takes it's toll.  The battery also takes quite a while to charge.  Not wild about using Memory stick rather than SD, but it is a Sony so it is to be expected.  Lastly, even at ISO 100 there is chroma noise in the shadows, but this can be tweaked in post-processing.  I suspect this is due to it being a 12 MP camera with a relatively small sensor.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: K. Erickson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about a month ago since my previous Sony Cybershot broke.  When I purchased that camera in 2005 it was over $300. I was pleased to see that the pricing had come down significantly ($159.99) and the mega pixels had increased (12.1 as oppossed to 7.2).  The camera is extremely lightweight, easy to use and takes beautiful pictures. My FAVORITE feature, however, is the different color shooting options.  You can shoot in black and white, sepia tone, vivid color and regular color.  I stumbled upon this feature by accident and I was so happy I did!  It gives you professional looking pictures with minimal effort.  I also like the smile feature where the camera detects when someone smiles and fires off a shot without your hitting the shutter button.All in all, a lot of camera for a little money!  I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Holl
Reviews.Content: Bought this a few weeks ago to get summertime shots of our kids.  We absolutley love this camera.  High quality pictures.  What i love is that the screen tells you what each setting does as you change the dial.  Idiot proof.  I also love that you can take photos in a streeming shot - most of the ones we have tried are always on a delay and you miss the timing when you are trying to get action shots of the kids.  This camera has a setting so that you can just hold the button in and it takes a series of pictures.  Really like this device - hope it is reliable.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Steve Kinney "Steve Kinney"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for about a little over a month now and it takes great pics! You cant go wrong with 12.1 megs and face detection too. It also has image stabilization for people with shaky hands. I upgraded to this from an old Sony Cybershot that only had 3.2 megs and I paid twice and much for that when they came out! I love the movie mode too and the menu is very easy to use plus it has a 2.7 inch display screen!

Reviews.Title: Great little camara
Reviews.Author: F. Giordano
Reviews.Content: We love this camera.  It is easy to use and takes great pictures.  The battery last a long time and we love how it slips into the charger and then you just plug the charger into the outlet.  No bothering with AA batteries which I believe run down too fast.  I recommend this camera to anyone and the price is right!

Reviews.Title: Great video/Poor still shots
Reviews.Author: Roberta Gedminas
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Sony Cybershot 6MP camera that I have had for years.  The quality of photos produced by my old camera led me to believe that this new camera would be of equal quality.  I must say I was very disappointed in the photo quality.  Unless you were right on top of what you were shooting, the photos were grainy, out of focus or blurred.  The pictures I took were not fast action or night shots--the shutter speed was not a factor.  I found that the most blurring was on photos where I had used the zoom feature.  I returned this camera and am sticking to my old one.

Reviews.Title: sony camera is unbelievable!
Reviews.Author: A. Woodward
Reviews.Content: I love it.  My previous camera was a Sony Cyber-Shot, too...3.2 pixels.  WOW - the difference between 3.2 and 12 is phenomenal!  Easy to use, easy to transfer.  A GREAT buy - unless something out of the ordinary happens, this will always be my go-to for cameras.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Marcus Peters
Reviews.Content: The zoom in shots are pretty pixelated.I'm not sure if it's as good as people say it is....

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera and I have to say that I am quite impressed. I am just a causal picture taker so I was looking for a camera that was easy to use and this is perfect. The pictures come out crystal clear and the camera is so easy to use. I love the LCD screen. For me the screen is large enough to take a quality picture. The buttons are easy to use and camera itself is very sleek and extremely lightweight. I read through the instruction manual to get an idea of how to use some of the more complicated features but if you don't have time for this it's okay. The auto shoot mode is great!I only have one issue with this camera. It only holds like 15MB of data which is nothing. I was just playing around with the camera and took like three pictures and a message came up that the memory was full! Not good...so I HAVE to buy a Sony Memory Stick so I can save my pictures. I really do feel this should have been included with the camera.Other than that this is an amazing camera and I would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Picutre Quaility
Reviews.Author: booklover68
Reviews.Content: I took my daughter to Paris June-July 2009.  This was our first trip to Europe.  I wanted a camera that would capture once in a life time memories.  The camera is small, light weight and has a good battery life.  The problem is the picture quality.  The camera took great pcitures of landscapes but failed when it came to indoor shots (day and night)and people at night.When I developed the pictures of my daughter(size 4,6) the majority  were grainy and the edges of her hair and face were blurry.I set the camera settings correctly so that was not the issue.  The problem is that the camera lacks consistency.  My daughters 2 year old Cannon took much better pictures and was about $50 less than this one.Thankfully I had a SLR as my main camera.  I'll sick to Nikon and Cannon in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket point n shoot
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Amazon.com is my first choice for online purchases. I am not a photographer. I wanted a small camera, I could carry in my purse or in my pocket. My choice after a minimum of research was the Sony Cybershot DSC-W220 12.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot Image Stabilization (Black) Have had it for a year or so and am still amazed at the macro shots I can get with this tiny point n shoot and for the money for a beginner, it can't be beat.  No actual macro settings but camera takes great close up shots. Still using it, still pleased.(...)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: BurnedThumbBum
Reviews.Content: I had this camera previously. The camera had gotten soaked in my kayak as I failed to keep it protected one day. I bought a newer Sony Cybershot. I brought the camera home and found it had some seemingly meaningless options... pet, food and things of that nature. I did want the B&W; and Sepia mode which the newer camera did not have. I quickly returned the newer camera. I was relieved when I found this trusty lil' camera I once had.. I love the vivid mode and ofcourse the B&W; and Sepia. Just an overall great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Pictures
Reviews.Author: Michael Guy
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera since it had good reviews and have a couple friends that like the camera.  Took about 50 pictues and all were blurry.  I called Sony support but they did not help at all.  So returned the camera.  I am not sure if I got a lemon or if camera truly takes bad pictures.  So, still using a 8 year old Olympus that take great pics, but is very slow and bulky.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera...the best
Reviews.Author: Isaac Pimentel "Isaac Pimentel"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, has everything, its only flaw is that it has very little internal memory capacity, but it's easily solved with an external memory.Good video capability, and tremendous resolution.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for my Non gadget loving Husband!
Reviews.Author: J. K. Hennessey "cat lover"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and the size makes it very portable. I love it

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Smyleelisa "smyleelisa"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this based on other amazon cust reviews along with cnet. Everything I read was true. Slightly complicated to use but only if you're trying to get fancy with it. Much better than my old canon. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: kerilr
Reviews.Content: Its a SONY.  Enough said.  Quality built.  Reliable.  Study.  Tough.  Takes clear photos.  Holds up to pocket or purse.  Battery life is very good.

Reviews.Title: A great camera
Reviews.Author: Karina R. Gomez
Reviews.Content: I bought it for a friend.  It works great that I had to buy one for myself.  It's a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Sny Cybershot DSC-W220 12.1MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: In to comfort and ease
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for husband as he wore out the last one he owned. Same exact camera.Any Sony Cybershot camera is a great pocket, on the go camera.The dial to select photo type (program, manual, daytime, snow, etc.) is easily understood and a wiz to us.Recommend this camera and newer models to anyone looking for a simple camera with great photographic capability

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mildred Garcia
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera with high quiality of pictures . The product is exactly of what i was expecting. strongly recommend it. Love it.

Reviews.Title: sony should be ashamed
Reviews.Author: David Zwisohn "dzwis"
Reviews.Content: Sony should be ashamed. As a longtime leader in electronics, this camera has developed a reputation as being problematic. Just look in the eBay listings and you'll see countless DSC-W220 cameras being sold for parts. WHY? because after the initial honeymoon, the lens of this camera will NOT stand the test of time. My camera's zoom lens failed within the warranty period. I sent it in to the repair center in Laredo TX ... no replacement, but they repaired it (or so I thought) ...within 2 months, the lens failed again. The aperture fails to open, so no light reaches the camera's inner electronics. Since I contacted them slightly AFTER 90 days. They have the audacity to suggest I pay $107 to get it repaired again. I'm gonna risk that, when they didn't fix it the first time?! I called again, and they said they'd cover a "percentage" of the repair. What a disgrace! I'm gonna try again to get a resolution, and if so I will be happy to post the results. If not, I will NEVER, EVER BUY or promote SONY EVER again. How ironic too, as a songwriter (and writer of music for commercials), I've even written music for Sony ... gee thanks!

Reviews.Title: The complete point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Robert Trudeau
Reviews.Content: The Sony dscw220 is a toughie! We dropped it in a creek in Virginia and later in a lake in Louisiana; in both cases we dried it and the Sony continued to shoot very effectively. As a semi-pro photog I want a camera that has a complete feature set but is easy to keep in a pocket. The Sony meets a high standard in optics and visual sensor.It's such an impressive unit that when I finally used up my first one I ordered the same model again, if used. The used one is maybe slightly sweeter than the first unit.Check it out!

Reviews.Title: wonderful gift!!
Reviews.Author: SUE FROM WSPT. "SUE"
Reviews.Content: i brought this camera for my mom for christmas and it was a hit. she loves it, it is easy for her to use, and the picture are soo clear.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for the price
Reviews.Author: DTrainorIII
Reviews.Content: My family has owned quite a few digital cameras in this price range ($100-$200) in the last few years and this is by far the best one. It provides excellent picture quality in all lights and settings and is extremely easy to use. The battery life is less than stellar, but has not ever been an issue for me... I definitely recommend this camera for high quality pics!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Shaffer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a gift, since the same one I was using was found to be so excellent.  The photos are so detailed, it beats my old 35mm SLR!  I use the Fine camera setting, with the greater resolution.  I have a 4GB memory card, so it holds lots of pictures even at this huge storage rate.  Studying the manual to learn the settings really pays!  I use the Scene setting almost constantly, as well as the smile detection.  It's great that these settings are remembered, not lost every time you turn off the camera.  The battery life is excellent...much better than using rechargeable AA's.  What I love most about this camera, is that, with Face Detection, you can shoot in almost any light and the skin colors will turn out perfectly...with no dark shading under the eyes!

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Scott
Reviews.Content: Works very well as advertised. I feel like I have to sharpen and adjust the color on my computer before sharing the pictures with friends, but overall the camera's performance is more than reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Demiko Dracket
Reviews.Content: Great buy! Awesome pics produced. Great features you would want in a affordable digital cam. No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Love comfy shoes
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Battery life is great.  The picture quality is comparable to more expensive cameras.  It is small enought to carry around at all times.  I enjoy using sony products- it is different from other brands of cameras.  If you have not used a Sony you may benefit from reading the manual.  I was able to pick up the camera and use it right away.  We took it on a trip within days of arrival.

Reviews.Title: great camera,nice picture quality
Reviews.Author: karthik dabeeru
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on the black Friday sale.Got a nice deal.About the camera,its simply awesome.Nice picture quality,easy to use,handy.The battery charging doesn't stay long,except that this piece is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Grand ma loves it
Reviews.Author: Poppa Dog
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my Mom for Xmas. I was a bit wary as she isn't a technical person. Dad insisted she needed a camera. My daughter has a Sony Cybershot. Last summer she used it on vacation and came home with literally a thousand photos and videos. Enough that I had to purchase her an external hard drive to store them! The camera worked in rain, snow and after bouncing around in my truck for three weeks without a problem. I decided that was the camera for my Mom. She figured it out in no time. Spent the Xmas day taking photos of the grandkids and festivities. She was very pleased and I was amazed. Pricing and delivery was excellent from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: All good
Reviews.Author: K. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I've bought several of these for friends in South America and everyone is pleased. Good size, good photo quality, easy to use, portable, and durable.

Reviews.Title: Sony 12.1
Reviews.Author: Judy K
Reviews.Content: The Camera store in Florida told me there was no difference between the 10.1 and the 12.1  There is a difference although both are excellent.  I gave my 10.1 to my daughter and this 12.1 takes excellent movies and wonderful clarity for digital photos.  I am completely satisfied and highly recommend it ..

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Homer Simpson "Homer J"
Reviews.Content: I got this for someone as a gift before she went on a trip to israel. She LOVED it. She has been extremely happy with the pictures she's taking on her trip and loves the incidentals (appearance, ease of use, features etc). Can't give it full five stars yet because she hasn't come back and printed any pics. If they are good, I will update it to a 5.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Starscream "Starscream"
Reviews.Content: while ive never used anything above a 10 megapixel 700 dollar SLR, for the price and feautures, this thing really blows me away. ive used several different cameras from kodaks easyshares to canons powershots and even used a fuji once - not too impressed with that one, anyways i decided to give it a chance seeing as though it was on sale, so i went for it, and have taken several test photos, and it hasnt dissapointed me once. ive only had it for a short few days. to sum it up, its a great pocket camera, high resolution quality and the different features are lots of fun to use. well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Pics
Reviews.Author: L. Scherzer "Foxi's friend"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new camera. It's compact,the pictures are unbelievably clear and the camera is very easy to use. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Elias De Jesus "Fireman11"
Reviews.Content: we needed a compact & easy to use camera for everyday events. This litlle guys has it all. The onlu down fall is the control buttons are very small to see, once you get use to it OK

Reviews.Title: Supuerb
Reviews.Author: M. U. Ahmed "MansurMN"
Reviews.Content: Wow! It is amazing, this is my 2nd Sony Cybershot in 2 years. Amazing to see the quality of pictures and the portability of the camera. Long live SONY :-)

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: K. Kaelin
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son, he loves it.  It takes beautiful pictures! Did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews before purchasing. Very happy with product, highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Melly Mel "Melly"
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent!!  Takes pictures with ease.  The 12mp screen is large and represents a great preview for the picture.  This camera has many features, alot of which I haven't even used yet.  But I love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Desiree S. Barroso V
Reviews.Content: Excellent... The photos are spectacular, many features that will make your photos better than any

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Amy O. "Amy"
Reviews.Content: I love Sony CyberShot cameras and this hasn't been any different. Easy to use and very well made. I highly recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: B. B. Finley
Reviews.Content: This camera was ready to go right out of the box.  I'm no pro, so when I could change the settings with ease, I was impressed.  Great pictures so far.

Reviews.Title: We love it.
Reviews.Author: Carbok
Reviews.Content: Bought it for wife to replace another digital camera.  We use or dot pictures and videos.  Couldn't ask for a better value prop

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Deborah M. Autry
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement camera for one my son broke. He loved the video capabilities (mostly the sound) from this little camera. Very clear and not distorted. Great picts as well

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Lindsay A. Lee-lampshire
Reviews.Content: After having spent some time researching for a good but affordable camera to travel with, I decided on this one.  It is an excellent camera for the novice.  Colors are sharp and it takes pictures very quickly.  The feature set is ample, easy to use, but offers plenty of fine tuning for the enthusiast.  I strongly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Panduka B. Koswatta
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. Light and easy to use. I bought this b/c, I had an olympus camera which failed to work after 2 years and when i contact olympus they said they do not have spare parts to repaire it and buy a new one. So I bought this sony camera since I did not want to buy an olympus brand anymore.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Quality
Reviews.Author: H. J. Westcott
Reviews.Content: I always had Cannon cameras.  I switched to this Sony camera because I thought it would have the same quality pictures and had it had several cool features.  Not only is the quality TERRIBLE, it is not intuitive to use.  I highly recommend that you DO NOT buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Ila N "Ili"
Reviews.Content: Although Sony Cybershot DSC-W220 is a 12.1MP Digital Camera, I do not see that the picture is higher quality, than my old Sony Camera (8MP). I'm disappointed with this camera.

Reviews.Title: sony cyber shot 12.1 mp
Reviews.Author: Amandeep Kaur "aman"
Reviews.Content: This camera is best like amazon is best....I always order items from amazon and they are always good..

Reviews.Title: WARNING: This Camera Comes To You Incomplete!
Reviews.Author: Sassa Frass "Dog Res Q.R."
Reviews.Content: OK, I have come into the 21st century by shooting the last role of film on my dinosaur Canon. I've never had a digital camera before, never shot one, didn't know squat about any of them, so I perused all the dozens of cameras looking for the ones with all 5 star reviews or next best.This camera had stellar reviews, so I bought it. Yes, it takes fantastic pictures, but NO MEMORY STICK is included! I had a permit to climb Mt. Whitney this week and the weather was holding, but had to cancel due to not having a shoot-ready camera! We contacted Sony, they said there was enough memory in the camera for 96 pictures. Great, I rescheduled the hike, but after Sony walked us through setting it up for the 96 pictures, the camera would not give us those. I took 3 which should have given us a balance of 93, but it knocked down to 62, then refused to let us take any more pictures. When you order this camera you're not getting it all. Memory sticks start at $44.95 up to $149.95, so factor those costs into the cost of this camera. Biting my nails hoping Sony Fed-Ex's the memory stick in time for my hike next week!When I get the thing up and running, I will edit this review and probably give it another 5-star review, but I'm highly pissed that the fact the camera was not shoot-ready was not posted in big, bold red letters or something to better catch your attention. The Product Info does say Memory Stick not included, but for a digital newbie like me, I wasn't familiar with the termonology.It's small as a pack of playing cards which is great for hiking as it is light weight enough to carry and to pack.OK, got the memory stick by Fedex who, per tracking, let it languish in Chicago for TWO DAYS! Pony Express is cheaper and more reliable than Fed Ex.Took the camera to Mt. Whitney yesterday. The moon was setting behind a peak at 3:30AM with violent storm clouds swirling about it like a horror movie. For the heck of it, shot some pictures. Wow, not only did it take quality pictures in the dead of night, but they came out fantastic enough to make a poster of. It looked as if the moon was arising out of Hell and on fire. Then to the east horizon the ISS was streaming for the sun which had not even arisen, turning gold. The camera picked up the tiny speck of light that was the ISS.Love it, can't stop taking pictures of EVERYTHING! If my 87 yr old mother learns to use this camera and likes it, I'll buy one for her.5 STARS for this camera!

Reviews.Title: ! BEWARE - USED CAMERA SOLD AS "NEW" !
Reviews.Author: Jason_Andrew_K
Reviews.Content: Bought this "NEW" camera *driectly from Amazon* for my fiance. I don't buy anything used or refurbished, so I made sure to choose a "NEW" item. Once camera was opened on Christmas, I was shocked to see there was an opened "SONY" sticker below another "SONY" sticker on top, sealing the box. This box was opened previously! I WILL NEVER, EVER BUY ANYTHING ELECTRONIC FROM AMAZON AGAIN! BEWARE!
